{{for|the skin pack released as the "4th Birthday Skin Pack" on PlayStation console editions|5th Birthday Skin Pack}}
{{Exclusive|Bedrock|Console|customtext=This feature is exclusive to {{BE}}, {{el|xbox 360}} and {{el|xbox one}}.}}
{{Infobox skin pack
| skins = 20
| price = Free
| release = BE:<br>September 12, 2017<br>LCE:<br>May 9, 2016
}}[[File:4th Birthday SP.jpg|thumb|Key art]]

'''4th Birthday Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Cite|url=https://news.xbox.com/en-us/2016/05/09/minecraft-fourth-birthday-skin-pack-xbox-editions/|title=It’s the big 4.0 – Happy Birthday Minecraft: Xbox Edition!|date=May 9, 2016|website=Xbox Wire}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] that includes 20 skins of [[Steve]] and [[Alex]] wearing [[mob]]-themed t-shirts, celebrating the fourth anniversary of ''[[Xbox 360 Edition]]'s'' release.

It was available from May 9 to May 16, 2016 and May 9 to May 21, 2017<ref>{{Tweet|4JStudios|861881805720481792|The FREE 1st, 2nd, 3rd & 4th Birthday Skin Packs are also available now for Xbox 360 and Xbox One. Get them while you can!}}</ref> for {{editions|xb360|xbone}}. 

Due to the [[Better Together Update]], it was added {{in|be}} on September 12, 2017, although it is only available to players who owned it already when they migrated from Legacy Console Edition.<ref>{{Mcnet|new-marketplace-space-sports-and-dinosaurs|New on Marketplace: Space, Sports and Dinosaurs|September 21, 2017|Tom Stone}}</ref>

This skin pack is available to claim on [https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/kolya/9PP4R17V8NWL?purchaseSignIn=true Xbox.com]
